carpet.rule.tickFreezeToggle.name: Tick Freeze Toggle
carpet.rule.tickFreezeToggle.desc: Allow tick freeze command to unfreeze the game when frozen.
carpet.rule.tickSprintEasyInterrupt.name: Tick Sprint Easy Interrupt
carpet.rule.tickSprintEasyInterrupt.desc: Allow tick freeze command without additional parameters to interrupt a sprint.
carpet.rule.tickWarpAlias.name: Tick Warp Alias
carpet.rule.tickWarpAlias.desc: Allow tick sprints via tick warp command.
